title: Add profile and model selection modals
description:
# Add Profile and Model Selection Modals

## User Story
**As a** Consoul user
**I want** to select different AI models and profiles from the UI
**So that** I can quickly switch between different use cases without editing config files

## Description

Create modal widgets for profile and model selection accessible from the ContextualTopBar (SOUL-55). Users should be able to:
- Browse available profiles (default, code-review, creative, fast)
- Switch AI models within the current provider
- See model metadata (cost, context window, capabilities)
- Reinitialize the AI provider with new settings without restarting

## Context

The ContextualTopBar (SOUL-55) will provide dropdown triggers for model/profile selection. This ticket implements the actual modal UI and selection logic that appears when those triggers are activated.

## Technical Notes

**Files to Create:**
- src/consoul/tui/widgets/profile_selector_modal.py
- src/consoul/tui/widgets/model_selector_modal.py

**Integration:**
- Listen for ContextualTopBar messages for profile/model selection requests
- Push appropriate modal using app.push_screen()
- Handle selection callback and reinitialize AI provider
- Update ContextualTopBar reactive properties

## Acceptance Criteria

**Given** I click the profile dropdown in ContextualTopBar
**When** the modal opens
**Then** I see a list of available profiles with current one highlighted

**Given** I select a different profile
**When** I confirm selection
**Then** the AI provider reinitializes with new profile settings

**Given** I'm in the middle of a conversation
**When** I switch models
**Then** conversation context is preserved

## Dependencies

**Prerequisites:**
- SOUL-55 (ContextualTopBar must exist to trigger modals)
